entry.title: Knightsbridge Shaving Cream 170g - Charcoal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Knightsbridge
Type: Shaving Preparations - Shaving Cream, Standard
Price: 0.00

Charcoal Shave Cream: 

The woody heart of this fragrance is a blend of strong cedarwood and sea bleached sandalwood, livened with fruity floral notes and a hint of coffee. Creamy vanilla and patchouli warm from the base, balanced with sugary accords and musks. In addition to charcoal that helps remove dirt and toxins from the skin as you shave.

Fragrance Notes:
Cedarwood - Sandalwood - Benzoin - Nagarmotha - Patchouli - Musk - Vanilla
Fruity - Coffee / Floral - Sugar Syrup

Ingredients: 
Aqua (Water), Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Coconut Fatty Acid, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Triethanolamine, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Alpha Iso-Methyl Ionone.

entry.title: Knightsbridge Shaving Cream 170g - Bay Rum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Knightsbridge
Type: Shaving Preparations - Shaving Cream, Standard
Price: 0.00

Bay Rum Shaving Cream:

With a heady Bay Rum scent marvelous blend of woody, spicy, and sugary scents, creating the perfect aromatic ambiance.Top notes of cinnamon and nutmeg intermingle with zesty citrus. White lily and basil leaves join rose petals and refreshing geranium to embrace the herbaceous accord. Patchouli and Bay rum mixed with hints of vanilla are perfect finishing accents to this masculine creation

Fragrance Contains Essential Oils of:
Orange, Geranium, Nutmeg, Orange, Patchouli, Basil,
Lemon, Cinnamon

Fragrance Notes:
T: BERGAMOT, ORANGE, and CINNAMON
M: ROSE, GERANIUM, BASIL, LILY
B: BAY RUM, PATCHOULI, VANILLA, MUSK

Ingredients:

Aqua (Water), Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Coconut
Fatty Acid, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Triethanolamine, Sodium
Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl
Salicylate, Coumarin, Eugenol, Limonene, Linalool, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-
Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde.

entry.title: Knightsbridge Shaving Cream 170g - Aloe Water
entry.summary:
Vendor: Knightsbridge
Type: Shaving Preparations - Shaving Cream, Standard
Price: 0.00

The natural fragrance from the Aloe Vera Leaf Juice (ALOE BARBADENSIS) is complemented by a subtle fragrance cocktail bursting to life with sour lemon and
neroli, lifted with lime blossom and petitgrain whilst warmed with petitgrain, all resting on soft powdery musks.

Fragrance Notes:
Aloe - Petitgrain - Lily of the Valley - Lime Blossom - Neroli - Musk

Ingredients: 

Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Stearic Acid,
Myristic Acid,Potassium Hydroxide, Coconut Fatty Acid,
Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance),Triethanolamine, Sodium
Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylphenyl
Methylpropional, Citral, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene,
Linalool.

Signature Shaving Cream:

A masculine scent built around woody notes of cedar, patchouli and resins with the subtle aromatic freshness of vetiver and geranium. Top notes of citrus and pink
pepper add vivacity and sparkle

Fragrance Contains Essential Oils of:
Cedar, Bergamot, Lemon, Patchouli, Vetivert

INGREDIENTS:
Aqua (Water), Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Potassium
Hydroxide, Coconut Fatty Acid, Glycerin, Parfum
(Fragrance), Triethanolamine, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol,
Ethylhexylglycerin, Citronellol, Hexyl

Limonene, Linalool.
